  • Method Details

    • createWin

      public JFrame createWin(int WIDTH, int HEIGHT, boolean isVisible)
      Default Title = Java Toolbox Default WIDTH = 500 Default HEIGHT = 300 Default Close Op = Dispose on Close
      Parameters:
      WIDTH - This is setting the WIDTH of the window
      HEIGHT - This is setting the HEIGHT of the window
      isVisible - This is setting if the window isVisible
      Returns:
      Returns a JFrame

    • createMenuWin

      public JFrame createMenuWin(int WIDTH, int HEIGHT, boolean isVisible)
      Parameters:
      WIDTH - Sets the height of the default Menu Window
      HEIGHT - Sets the height of the default Menu Window
      isVisible - Sets if the default Menu Window is visible
      Returns:
      returns the JFrame

    • createDrawSurface

      public JPanel createDrawSurface(int WIDTH, int HEIGHT)

    • getMComp

      public Component getMComp(JFrame win, int i)
      Parameters:
      win - JFrame that you would like to collect the MenuItem Component
      i - Index of the Menu you would like to get the child of
      Returns:
      returns the JFrame

    • getMComp

      public Component getMComp(JFrame win, int i, int j)
      Parameters:
      win - JFrame that you would like to collect the MenuItem Component
      i - Index of the Menu you would like to get the child of
      j - Index of the MenuItem you would like to get
      Returns:
      returns the JFrame

    • set

      public void set(JFrame win, boolean slrt, String title)
      Parameters:
      win - JFrame that you would like to change the title for
      slrt - Checking if you would like to use the setRelativeLocationTo() or not
      title - What the new title should be

    • set

      public void set(JFrame win, boolean slrt, boolean isMenuWindow, int width, int height)
      Parameters:
      win - JFrame that you would like to change the width and height for
      slrt - Checking if you would like to use the setRelativeLocationTo() or not
      isMenuWindow - Checking if it is a menu window or a regular window. NOTE: When testing setPreferedSize wouldn't work with menu windows. FIX: Added isMenuWindow check
      width - Sets the width of the window
      height - Sets the height of the window

    • set

      public void set(JFrame win, boolean slrt, boolean isVisible)
      Parameters:
      win - JFrame that you would like to set if visible
      slrt - Checking if you would like to use the setRelativeLocationTo() or not
      isVisible - Setting if the window is visible

    • set

      public void set(JFrame win, boolean slrt, Image ic)
      Parameters:
      win - JFrame that you would like to collect the MenuItem Component
      slrt - Checking if you would like to use the setRelativeLocationTo() or not
      ic - Setting Icon of window

    • set

      public void set(JFrame win, boolean slrt, boolean isMenuWindow, String title, int width, int height, boolean isVisible, Image ic)
      Parameters:
      win - JFrame that you would like to collect the MenuItem Component
      slrt - Checking if you would like to use the setRelativeLocationTo() or not
      isMenuWindow - Checking if the window is a menu window
      title - setting the title
      width - setting the width
      height - setting the height
      isVisible - setting if the window is visible
      ic - setting the icon
